title: Ganesh Chaturthi Vibes
description: Celebrate the birth of Lord Ganesha and highlight the immersion tradition.
captions:
🐘 Ganesh Chaturthi is more than a festival — it’s a 10-day celebration of faith, devotion, and unity.

From colourful idols to grand visarjans, every corner echoes with chants of 'Ganpati Bappa Morya!'

📍 Maharashtra | Karnataka | Goa | Telangana | Tamil Nadu

🌟 Tradition meets celebration.
aim: Culturally connect with South and West Indian audiences
benefit: Create regional resonance during the festive period

title: Krishna Janmashtami Celebrations
description: Highlight birth of Lord Krishna, fasting, Dahi Handi scenes.
captions:
👶🏼 Janmashtami calls for midnight prayers, fasting, and thrilling Dahi Handi events!

From Vrindavan to Mumbai, the spirit of Krishna lives on through dance, devotion, and dazzle.

🌟 Celebrated with zeal across India.

#KrishnaJanmashtami #DahiHandi
aim: Tie into cultural moments and reach youth via Dahi Handi imagery
benefit: Improve brand relatability via festival connect

title: India’s Pride: Independence Day
description: Celebrate national pride and unity on August 15.
captions:
🎉 78 years of independence, resilience, and unity.

From every rooftop flies the tricolour — a symbol of hope, sacrifice, and strength.

🇮🇳 Jai Hind!
benefit: Widen brand appeal with patriotic alignment

title: Raksha Bandhan Bonds
description: Highlight sibling love and Rakhi tradition.
captions:
🎀 A thread that protects, a bond that lasts.

This Raksha Bandhan, celebrate the timeless relationship of love, laughter, and loyalty.

#HappyRakshaBandhan #SiblingGoals

title: International Cat Day
description: Celebrate domestic cats and highlight pet care awareness.
captions:
🐱 It’s International Cat Day! Give your feline friend some extra love today.

Whether you’re a proud cat parent or just love cat memes — this day is purr-fect for you.

#InternationalCatDay #CatLove
aim: Leverage global trend and soft content
